messages.content: You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
회사별 검사데이터 건수를 알려줘, 그리고 건수가 가장 많은 순서로 출력해줘
SELECT vndr_id, COUNT(1) FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd GROUP BY vndr_id ORDER BY 2 DESC
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
검사일기준 년월단위로 검사데이터 건수를 알려줘 , 그리고 년월기준 오름차순으로 정렬해줘
SELECT to_char(activity_dtm,'yyyy-mm'), COUNT(1) FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd GROUP BY to_char(activity_dtm,'yyyy-mm') ORDER BY 1 ASC
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
LOT ID 별로 검사 데이터 건수를 집계하는데, 그중 데이터가 많은순으로 5개의 데이터만 보여줘
SELECT lot_id, COUNT(1) FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd GROUP BY lot_id ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 5
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
검사결과가 합격이 아닌 데이터를 출력해줘, 출력데이터는 회사ID,LOT ID,생산계획번호,품번,품명 이야
SELECT vndr_id, lot_id, production_order_id, product_id, product_name FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE result_value != '합격'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
검사결과가 합격인 데이터를 출력해줘, 출력데이터는 회사ID,LOT ID,생산계획번호,품번,품명,공정코드,공정명이야
SELECT vndr_id, lot_id, production_order_id, product_id, product_name, process_id, process_name FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE result_value = '합격'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
회사ID가 COPI_00003 인 데이터중에 검사코드가 L64,L63,L62,L61 인 데이터를 출력해줘, 출력데이터는 타각번호,생산계획번호,품번,품명,공정코드,공정명,검사항목,검사항목명이야

SELECT lot_id, production_order_id, product_id, product_name, process_id, process_name, inspect_item_type_cd, inspect_item_type_name FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE vndr_id = 'COPI_00003' AND product_inspect_id IN ('L61', 'L62', 'L63', 'L64')
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
회사ID가 COPI_00003 인 데이터중에 검사명이 도막두께 #1인 데이터를 출력해줘, 출력데이터는 타각번호,생산계획번호,품명,공정명,검사명이야
SELECT lot_id, production_order_id, product_name, process_name, product_inspect_name FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE vndr_id = 'COPI_00003' AND product_inspect_name = '도막두께 #1'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
검사결과가 합격이 아닌 데이터를 출력해줘, 출력 데이터는 회사id,lotid,생산계획번호,품명,하한,중간,상한,입력데이터야
SELECT vndr_id, lot_id, production_order_id, product_name, usl, csl, lsl, collect_value_01 FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE result_value != '합격'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
검사결과가 합격이 아닌 데이터중에, 입력데이터가 2개이상 입력된 데이터를 출력해줘, 출력데이터는 회사id,타각번호,생산계획번호,입력데이터1~10번이야

SELECT vndr_id, lot_id, production_order_id, collect_value_01, collect_value_02, collect_value_03, collect_value_04, collect_value_05, collect_value_06, collect_value_07, collect_value_08, collect_value_09, collect_value_10 FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE result_value != '합격' AND collect_value_01 IS NOT NULL AND collect_value_02 IS NOT NULL
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
검사결과가 합격이 아닌 데이터중에 하한값보다 낮은 입력값을 가진 데이터를 출력해줘 출력데이터는 회사id,lotid,생산계획번호,품번,검사코드,하한값,입력값이야

SELECT vndr_id, lot_id, production_order_id, product_id, product_inspect_id, lcl, collect_value_01 FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE result_value != '합격' AND lcl IS NOT NULL AND collect_value_01 IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(collect_value_01) != '' AND lcl > to_number(collect_value_01, 'L999G9999')
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
검사결과가 합격이 아닌 데이터중에 상한값보다 높은 입력값을 가진 데이터를 출력해줘 출력데이터는 회사id,lotid,생산계획번호,품번,검사코드,상한값,입력값이야

SELECT vndr_id, lot_id, production_order_id, product_id, product_inspect_id, ucl, collect_value_01 FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE result_value != '합격' AND lcl IS NOT NULL AND collect_value_01 IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(collect_value_01) != '' AND ucl < to_number(collect_value_01, 'L999G9999')
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
검사차수가 2차이상인 데이터를 출력해줘, 출력데이터는 회사id,타각번호,생산계획번호,품번,품명,검사코드,검사명,검사차수야
SELECT vndr_id, lot_id, production_order_id, product_id, product_name, product_inspect_id, product_inspect_name, collect_sequence FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE collect_sequence > 1
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
회사id가 COPI_00001 인 데이터 중에 2025년 3월에 검사한 모든 데이터를 보여줘
SELECT * FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE vndr_id = 'COPI_00001' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM activity_dtm) = 2025 AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM activity_dtm) = 3
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2025년 3월에 검사한 데이터중에 검사결과가 합격인 데이터의 총 건수를 알려줘

SELECT result_value, COUNT(1) FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE vndr_id = 'COPI_00001' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM activity_dtm) = 2025 AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM activity_dtm) = 3 AND result_value = '합격' GROUP BY result_value
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
검사자가 P1인 데이터 중에 합격인 건수와 합격이 아닌 건수를 알려줘
SELECT activity_user, result_value, COUNT(1) FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE activity_user = 'P1' GROUP BY activity_user, result_value
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
회사id가 COPI_00003인 데이터의 검사 결과 합격률을 알려줘

WITH result_counts AS (SELECT CASE WHEN result_value = '합격' THEN '합격' ELSE '불합격' END AS result_status, COUNT(*) AS count FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE vndr_id = 'COPI_00001' GROUP BY CASE WHEN result_value = '합격' THEN '합격' ELSE '불합격' END) SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN result_status = '합격' THEN count ELSE 0 END) AS pass_count, SUM(CASE WHEN result_status = '불합격' THEN count ELSE 0 END) AS fail_count, SUM(count) AS total_count, ROUND((SUM(CASE WHEN result_status = '합격' THEN count ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / SUM(count)), 2) AS pass_rate FROM result_counts
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
검사데이터중에 데이터인터페이스로 수신된 데이터를 보여줘, 출력할 데이터는 인터페이스ID,회사ID,타각번호,생산계획번호,품번,품명 이야
SELECT if_id, vndr_id, lot_id, production_order_id, product_id, product_name FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE if_id IS NOT NULL
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
회사id가 COPI_00003이고, 품번이 FBA11-OPC 인 데이터는 어떤 검사코드로 검사한 결과가 있는지 알려줘,검사명도 같이 알려줘
SELECT DISTINCT product_inspect_id, product_inspect_name FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE vndr_id = 'COPI_00003' AND product_id = 'FBA11-OPC'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
품번 FGA1E-OHG 의 검사항목 과 검사항목별 상,중,하한값을 알려줘
SELECT DISTINCT product_inspect_id, product_inspect_name, usl, csl, lsl FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE product_id = 'FGA1E-OHG'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
COPI_00003 인 회사는 어떤 품목들을 검사하고있는지 알려줘
SELECT DISTINCT product_id, product_name FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE vndr_id = 'COPI_00003'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
COPI_00003인 회사의 품목별 검사건수를 알려줘
SELECT product_id, COUNT(1) FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE vndr_id = 'COPI_00003' GROUP BY product_id
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
COPI_00003인 회사의 품목별 검사건수를 찾을건데, 검사결과가 합격이 아닌대상은 제외해줘
SELECT product_id, COUNT(1) FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE vndr_id = 'COPI_00003' AND result_value != '합격' GROUP BY product_id
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
COPI_00001인 회사의 검사자가 위승진인 데이터를 출력해줘, 출력데이터는 lotid,생산계획번호,품번,품명,검사코드,검사명이야
SELECT lot_id, production_order_id, product_id, product_name, product_inspect_id, product_inspect_name FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE vndr_id = 'COPI_00001' AND activity_user = '위승진'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
COPI_00001인 회사의 월별 검사건수를 출력해줘
SELECT to_char(activity_dtm, 'yyyy-mm'), COUNT(1) FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE vndr_id = 'COPI_00001' GROUP BY to_char(activity_dtm, 'yyyy-mm') ORDER BY 1
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
COPI_00001인 회사의 검사 결과가 합격인 데이터의 건수를 월별로출력해줘
SELECT to_char(activity_dtm, 'yyyy-mm'), COUNT(1) FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE vndr_id = 'COPI_00001' AND result_value = '합격' GROUP BY to_char(activity_dtm, 'yyyy-mm') ORDER BY 1 ASC
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
COPI_00003 회사의 타각번호가 321130인 데이터를 출력해줘
SELECT * FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE vndr_id = 'COPI_00003' AND lot_id = '321130'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
LOTID가 430511 인 품번과 품명을 알려줘
SELECT DISTINCT product_id, product_name FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE lot_id = '430511'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
생산계획번호가 700005668533 인 데이터를 출력해줘
SELECT * FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE production_order_id = '700005668533'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
생산계획번호가 700005668829인 데이터중에 검사결과가 합격이 아닌 데이터가 있는지 알려줄래?
SELECT * FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE production_order_id = '700005668829' AND result_value != '합격'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
생산계획번호가 700005668829 이고 검사항목유형코드가 CT01인 데이터를 출력해줘
SELECT * FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE production_order_id = '700005668829' AND inspect_item_type_cd = 'CT01'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
품번이 FGA1E-OHG 이고 검사항목유형이 공정검사인 데이터를 출력해줘
SELECT * FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE product_id = 'FGA1E-OHG' AND inspect_item_type_name = '공정검사'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
품번이 FGA로 시작하고, 공정이 제관인 데이터를 출력해줘
SELECT * FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE product_id LIKE 'FGA%' AND process_name = '제관'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
타각번호가 321089, 생산계획번호가 700005668217 인 데이터의 판매번호를 알려줘
SELECT DISTINCT sale_id FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE lot_id = '321089' AND production_order_id = '700005668217'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
타각번호가 430357 이고 생산계획번호가 700005668591 인 검사결과의 품목과 품번, 검사코드와 검사코드명,그리고 검사결과를 알려줘
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_inspect_id, product_inspect_name, result_value FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE lot_id = '430357' AND production_order_id = '700005668591'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
생산계획번호 700005667504이고 품번 FBA11-OPC 의 검사를 누가 진행했는지, 검사결과는 뭔지 알려줘
SELECT product_inspect_id, product_inspect_name, activity_user, result_value FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE production_order_id = '700005667504' AND product_id = 'FBA11-OPC'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
생산계획번호가 입력되지 않은 데이터를 알려줘
SELECT * FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data WHERE production_order_id IS NULL OR TRIM(production_order_id) = ''
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
생산계획번호 700005668541인 데이터의 품번과 품명, 그리고 어느 회사 제품인지도 알려줘
SELECT product_id, product_name, vndr_id FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE production_order_id = '700005668541'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
생산계획번호 700005668821 의 검사일시를 알려줘
SELECT production_order_id, activity_dtm FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE production_order_id = '700005668821'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
생산계획번호 700005668821 의 검사일시를 품번,검사코드를 포함해서 알려줘
SELECT production_order_id, product_id, product_inspect_id, activity_dtm FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE production_order_id = '700005668821'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
동일한 LOT를 가진 생산계획번호가 존재하는지 찾아줘
SELECT lot_id, COUNT(DISTINCT production_order_id) FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd GROUP BY lot_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT production_order_id) > 1
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
COPI_00003 회사 데이터중에 타각번호의 길이가 6자리가 넘는 데이터가 있는지 찾아줘
SELECT * FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE vndr_id = 'COPI_00003' AND LENGTH(lot_id) > 6
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
COPI_00003 회사 데이터중에 검사자가 W3인 데이터중에 불량품이 있는지 찾아줘
SELECT * FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE vndr_id = 'COPI_00003' AND activity_user = 'W3' AND result_value != '합격'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
COPI_00003 회사 데이터에서 검사자별로 검출한 불량이 몇건이나 되는지 알려줘
SELECT activity_user, COUNT(1) FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE vndr_id = 'COPI_00003' AND result_value != '합격' GROUP BY activity_user
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
불량을 가장 많이 검출한 검사자를 알려줘
SELECT activity_user, COUNT(1) FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE result_value != '합격' GROUP BY activity_user ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 1
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
불량이 가장 많이 발생한 품번을 알려줘
SELECT product_id, COUNT(1) FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE result_value != '합격' GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 1
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2024년 1월에 검사된 FGA1E-OHG, FGA1E-LEG 품번의 모든 타각번호를 알려줘
SELECT DISTINCT lot_id FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE product_id IN ('FGA1E-OHG', 'FGA1E-LEG') AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM activity_dtm) = 2024 AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM activity_dtm) = 1
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
품번 FGA1E-OHG, FGA1E-LEG 데이터중에 검사결과가 불합격인 데이터를 보여줘
SELECT * FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE product_id IN ('FGA1E-OHG', 'FGA1E-LEG') AND result_value != '합격'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
생산계획번호가 700005675508 인 품목의 검사항목별 검사결과를 알려줘
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_inspect_id, product_inspect_name, result_value FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE production_order_id = '700005675508'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
lotid가 321141 인 품목의 검사항목별 검사결과를 알려줘
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_inspect_id, product_inspect_name, result_value FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd WHERE lot_id = '321141'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
회사별, 월별 검사데이터 총건수와 합격, 불합격 건수를 출력해줘

SELECT vndr_id, TO_CHAR(activity_dtm, 'yyyy-mm') AS activity_month, COUNT(1) AS total_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN result_value = '합격' THEN 1 END) AS pass_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN result_value != '합격' THEN 1 END) AS fail_count FROM wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd GROUP BY vndr_id, TO_CHAR(activity_dtm, 'yyyy-mm') ORDER BY order by 1,2
